meanings.definition: A small swelling or aggregation of cells in the body, especially on the thyroid gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor found nodules on her thyroid during the check-up.
meanings.sent2: The geologist discovered nodules of minerals in the cave.
meanings.sent3: The nodules on the tree bark looked like tiny bumps waving hello.
meanings.sent4: The nodules of knowledge in his brain expanded with each new book he read.
meanings.sent5: The nodules on the fabric created a bumpy texture that was fun to touch.

meanings.definition: A small rounded lump of matter distinct from its surroundings.
meanings.sent1: She noticed nodules of sugar at the bottom of her tea cup.
meanings.sent2: The artist sculpted nodules of clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent3: The nodules of paint on the canvas seemed to be having a colorful party.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with nodules of flowers, creating a vibrant mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The nodules of sand on the beach sparkled in the sunlight.
